Module pipeline
Package tcpassos.pipeline

Interface MergeablePipeline<BEGIN,END,P extends BasePipeline<BEGIN,?>,P_END>

Type Parameters:
BEGIN - the type of the beginning result
END - the type of the end result
P - the type of the base pipeline
P_END - the type of the end result of the base pipeline
All Superinterfaces:
BasePipeline<BEGIN,END>
All Known Subinterfaces:
AsyncPipeline.Branched<BEGIN,END>, BranchedPipeline<BEGIN,END>, ParallelPipeline<BEGIN,END>
public interface MergeablePipeline<BEGIN,END,P extends BasePipeline<BEGIN,?>,P_END> extends BasePipeline<BEGIN,END>
Represents a pipeline that can be joined with other pipelines.

  • Method Details

    • connect

      <NEW_P_END> MergeablePipeline<BEGIN,?,?,NEW_P_END> connect(Pipeline<? super P_END,NEW_P_END> next)
      Connects the current pipeline with the specified next pipeline.
      Type Parameters:
      NEW_P_END - The type of the end result of the next pipeline.
      Parameters:
      next - The next pipeline to connect.
      Returns:
      A new pipeline with the specified next pipeline connected.

    • merge

      P merge(BinaryOperator<P_END> joiner)
      Joins multiple branch pipelines into a single pipeline using the specified joiner function.
      Parameters:
      joiner - the binary operator used to join the branch pipelines
      Returns:
      the joined pipeline
